BMP180

Bosch Digital Temperature / Pressure Sensor

  • Device address 119
  • Address type 7-bit

Addr 170

16-bytes

Read-only

Pressure calibration AC1

For calibration

Addr 172

16-bytes

Read-only

Pressure calibration AC2

For calibration

Addr 174

16-bytes

Read-only

Temperature calibration 3

For calibration

Addr 176

16-bytes

Read-only

Temperature calibration 4

For calibration

Addr 178

16-bytes

Read-only

Temperature calibration 5

For calibration

Addr 180

16-bytes

Read-only

Temperature calibration 6

For calibration

Addr 182

16-bytes

Read-only

Pressure calibration VB1

For calibration

Addr 184

16-bytes

Read-only

Pressure calibration VB2

For calibration

Addr 188

16-bytes

Read-only

Temperature calibration MC

For calibration

Addr 190

16-bytes

Read-only

Temperature calibration MD

For calibration

Addr 244

8-bytes

Write-only

Register to write commands

Register stores what the measurement type should be

Addr 246

16-bytes

Read-only

Register that stores measurement results

Register stores most recent measurement result

Functions

  • temperature.asCelsius - Reads the temperature
